title: The works of Robert Burns;
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: Lord Buchan has the pleasure to invite Mr. Burns to make one at the coronation of the bust of Thomson, on Ednam Hill on the 22d of September  ; for which day perhaps his muse may inspire  an ode suited to the occasion.
